reviews.caption: First time I walked in I instantly recognized Ian from the Avon market. He knows his stuff and if he doesn't he'll do some Google research to make sure no one gets a bum deal. Out The Basement has become my go to, and luckily only 30 minutes from where I live, so I pop in around once a month to see what new goodies he has.

holy freakin crap. if you’re interested in anything at all come to this store. Ian was extremely friendly helpful and honest. I spent two hours trying everything on that he picked out and he showed kindness and interest. 5 star human being 5 star shop!! Never been so happy giving someone my money!
This shop is awesome ! Incrdible lego sets . Great deals . Im in love 10/10
My son stumbled into here over the weekend. Fantastic store with something for everyone and a really wonderful owner. Really fantastic place we love to support.
Very cool shop! Was visiting from out of town. The owner has literally brought his business out of his basement and that is just awesome! Kudos!
My sons favorite store in the whole world!  Awesome owner and great selection!

Great shop.  Extremely friendly young man was running the place and was very helpful.  Very nostalgic vibe.  I was able to find a Vintage Ben Cooper ET costume for a very reasonable price. I will be adding this to my list of “honey holes”
Excellent selection and vibe, Ian is very friendly and helpful!

My 3yo loves 'the Lego store', we usually spend about a half hour just looking at everything before picking a few small toys. They have toys for kids as well as for serious collectors. Owner is always there and so friendly.
Great shop! I swung by and they had an amazing Lego Star Wars collection.

Very cool and caring owners selling and buying an assortment of retro toys along with some vintage clothes and other items. They also have a wide assortment of Legos sets along with huge table of mixed Lego pieces and a make your own mini figure area. Definitely worth checking out this spot!

Had an amazing experience here, ended up spending a bunch of time and money here.  The owner was super everything lol (honest, friendly, knowledgeable, helpful)  The place could use a good dusting and some effort put into organizing things.  I will definitely be recommending this place, especially for those that are Lego fans.
Great place to find stuff that you are looking for. There is something for everyone, very nice people super helpful
Amazing place to find old school toys vintage clothing and star wars memorabilia. Absolutely recommend
Went yesterday. Awesome little shop with good prices. Willing to deal and offers good money for trade ins. Shop here first if you’re visiting like I am.
A nice little establishment. Plenty of Lego products including a creation area. Along with great model train prices!
